text: The Rain () is a 1976 Bengali-Urdu bilingual Bangladeshi film which stars Wasim and Olivia in lead roles. The film earned two awards at the 2nd Bangladesh National Film Awards. ==Soundtrack Bangla== ==Soundtrack Urdu== == Awards == 2nd Bangladesh National Film Awards * Best Male Playback Singer - Mahmudunnabi; * Best Female Playback Singer - Runa Laila == References == == External links == * Category:1976 films Category:Bangladeshi films Category:Bengali-language films Category:Films scored by Anwar Parvez Category:1970s Bengali-language films
title: The Rain (film)
